sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to Event Hub

Discover amazing events, book tickets, and create unforgettable experiences

Browse Events Get Started
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Event Hub?

The complete solution for event management and ticket booking

Easy Booking

Simple and secure ticket booking process with multiple payment options

Event Management

Complete tools for organizers to create and manage successful events

Reviews & Ratings

Share your experience and help others discover great events

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Join thousands of event-goers and organizers who trust Event Hub

Create Your Account
); }; export default Home;
